item.description:
There are only 14 summer summer nights left until Labor Day weekend.  Where did the summer go?

 

Come out and spend a night on the beach playing with light sources and capturing the full moon.  There are some beach fences and a creepy old abandoned building we can focus on if we want.

 

Bring light sources such as glow sticks, sparklers, flashlights, colored lights, your smart phone, etc. -- anything we can use to make illuminated photos.  Also, bring ideas for shooting.  Do some research and come with at least one idea we can try.

 

We'll meet across from Santorini's and walk down to the area where the fence and creepy building is located.

 

Hope to see you!

 

RAIN DATE: If the weather guys are reporting a 60%+ chance of rain, we'll postpone to the next night - Saturday, 9/1.  Keep an eye on your email as the date gets closer if you RSVP yes.
item.how_to_find_us: Sitting on the wall across from Santorini's
item.name: Playing With Light - Revere Beach
